src:
Policija ni mogla verjeti: gospa slekla hlače in lulala na dvorišču postaje
Zgodilo se je v Zagrebu.
02 Nov 2019, 08:48 by Ma. M.
Kar sredi dvorišča policijske postaje v Zagrebu je Božica Š. (58) opravila nujno potrebo, medtem ko se je eden izmed njenih članov mudil na kriminalistični preiskavi na prav tej postaji.Zagrebško sodišče ji je naložilo denarno kazen v višini 40 evrov ter še stroške postopka. Sodnica je dejala, da je osramotila moralna čustva mimoidočih. S tem je kršila javni red in mir.
text:
The police couldn't believe it: the lady stripped off her pants and lulled in the yard of the station
It happened in Zagreb.
02 Nov 2019, 08:48 by Ma. M.
Right in the middle of the courtyard of the Zagreb Police Station is Božica Š. (58) met an urgent need while one of its members was undergoing a criminal investigation at that particular station. The judge said she was ridiculed by the moral emotions of passers-by. In doing so, it violated public order and peace.
